trans-unit.source: These APIs allow you to create and manage availability sets for virtual machines.
trans-unit.target: These APIs allow you to create and manage availability sets for virtual machines.

trans-unit.source: The following information is common to all tasks that you might do related to availability sets:
trans-unit.target: The following information is common to all tasks that you might do related to availability sets:

trans-unit.source: Replace {subscription-id} with your subscription identifier in the URI.
trans-unit.target: Replace {subscription-id} with your subscription identifier in the URI.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <externalLink><linkText>Using Resource groups to manage your Azure resources</linkText><linkUri>http://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/documentation/articles/resource-group-portal/</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <externalLink><linkText>Using Resource groups to manage your Azure resources</linkText><linkUri>http://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/documentation/articles/resource-group-portal/</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: Replace {vm-name} with your virtual machine name in the URI.
trans-unit.target: Replace {vm-name} with your virtual machine name in the URI.

trans-unit.source: Set the Authorization header to a JSON Web Token that you obtain from Azure Active Directory.
trans-unit.target: Set the Authorization header to a JSON Web Token that you obtain from Azure Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="a1caa0f7-3250-46ed-95b5-8603d902383b" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authenticating Azure Resource Manager requests</link>
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="a1caa0f7-3250-46ed-95b5-8603d902383b" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authenticating Azure Resource Manager requests</link>
